head.title: BEST BUY TO SELL AT&T SERVICES

identified-content.classifier: Top/Classifieds/Job Market/Job Categories/Technology, Telecommunications and Internet
Top/Classifieds/Job Market/Job Categories/Media, Entertainment and Publishing

hedline.hl1: BEST BUY TO SELL AT&T SERVICES

abstract.p: Best Buy will soon begin offering AT&T's high-speed Internet and digital cable television services; photo (S)

block.p: Best Buy, the operator of the nation's largest chain of electronics stores, will begin offering AT&T's high-speed Internet and digital cable television services next month. The deal, considered a boost for AT&T's ambitions to offer a variety of broadband communications and entertainment services, is part of a wider trend. RadioShack has similar agreements with Verizon Communications, Sprint and Microsoft, while Best Buy stores already offer Microsoft's MSN Internet service. ''Retail will be important,'' said Doug Seserman of AT&T's broadband division, ''as a source of information that will help us work with consumer electronics manufacturers on innovative products for the future.''
